DOC.brief_summary: Pituitary regulation widely use vitro fertilization ( IVF ) procedures . It suppress spontaneous luteinizing hormone ( LH ) surge , also make follicle growth evenly . At present , standard gonadotropin release hormone analogue ( GnRH-a ) long protocol use around 85 % patient investigator 's center . However , patient inject short term GnRH-a 0.05mg 0.1mg daily around 3 week one IVF cycle . Long term GnRH-a , usually use patient endometriosis , show increase IVF outcome alter endometrial receptivity . Moreover , also convenient patient inject GnRH-a daily . In order make patient feel comfortable IVF treatment , investigator use new ovarian stimulation protocol since begin 2015 . The investigator give patient long term GnRH-a ( 3.75mg ) menstrual cycle D2 , begin use Gn stimulate follicle growth around 30 day later base hormone level follicle size . In pilot observational study several patient , LH surge occur ovarian stimulation . The aim randomize control study compare efficiency new protocol standard GnRH-a long protocol investigator 's center .
DOC.brief_title: The Application New Ovarian Stimulation Protocol IVF
DOC.detailed_description: The primary outcome ongoing pregnancy rate . Other parameter include number oocyte retrieve , 2 pronucleus ( 2PN ) fertilization rate , high quality embryo formation rate , implantation rate , spontaneous abortion rate , ectopic pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: First IVF cycle ; With normal ovarian reserve ( FSH < 10 mIU/mL ; antral follicle count > 5 ) ; With normal uterine . Preimplantation genetic diagnosis cycle ; Oocyte donation sperm donation cycle .
